title: Bitcoin Hits ATH Yet Loses Market Share, Setting Up a Potential ‘Alt-Season’
description: Bitcoin, often referred to as digital gold, recently reached an all-time high, trading at over $120,000. Experts have attributed the surge to numerous factors, including billions of dollars channelled into this crypto via spot ETFs and a weakening US dollar. This is a historic moment for crypto enthusiasts, but something surprising is happening.
